EmailTemplate.name: 6/18/2013 - Overbright webinar.Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Get the Most From Your Virtual Infrastructure: Free Webinar Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Just a reminder to reserve your spot today <http://go.vmturbo.com/overbright_vmturbo_webinar_6_18_2013.html> for our free webinar on June 18 at 10AM. In this session, you will learn from OverBright and VMTurbo about a new cost-reducing approach to virtual and cloud infrastructure management.
Want more info on VMTurbo before the webinar? Click here <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/themes/vmturbo/pdf/VMTurbo-Brochure/#/tired> for a brief overview.
Kind Regards The VMTurbo Team
